profile.bio: Founder and Board Member @ BitCoin India, Board Member @ Mantis Destroyer Inc, Director/Licensee @ North Lakes Diamond Realty Pty Ltd (Managing 1150 Properties with 30 Staff), Director @ MassTec Industries Ltd, Inventor of MassBloc, Contracted Licenses for NZ, Australia, Tasmania and South Africa with patents for US, Owns needmypassword.com, Innovator of the year for Fletcher Company (Largest NZ company) Brett has a number of investments through Angel.co and loves to work smart, think outside the box, have fun and help everyone he possibly can. Brett aims to take Bitcoin India to extreme levels and make it successful for all shareholders and create a fantastic experience for all that buy/sell, trade and or touch Bitcoin India. Utilizing his experience, contacts, Business Partner, Lead Syndicate and Advisors we look to take BTCI to the world.
